title: How to tell my parents I want to be a singer - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends. Are you asking for them to pay for music school? Are you still living at home? If you are independent, the only objection that would count would be if one of them said, “But I planned on your taking over my business so I could retire”. But they would be within their rights to refuse to pay for your training. Get a plan.
That's easy. Where do you sing? Stage? Weddings? A band? Invite them to a performance. Sing your best. If you're any good you both will know.
